text: Atisaya va'ita ahe ti gosta, jicya mobadalyata tyanni svatahla vikuna takale. Te tyance kupra (inkara) karane hoya, allahatarphe avatarita granthala kevala ya gostica dvesa karuna ki allahane apali krpa denagi, jya dasavara icchile avatarita keli. Ya karanane te prakopavara prakopace bhagidara tharale. Ani tya kaphiram (inkara karanaryam) karita apamanadayaka azaba (siksa-yatana) ahe
